skills.title: Project Management
skills.description: Managed complex army projects with multiple inputs and parameters, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to project goals through effective coordination and resource allocation. Led cross-functional teams to achieve objectives, utilizing strategic planning and problem-solving skills to navigate challenges and drive project success.

skills.title: C/C++
skills.description: Gained extensive experience in C and C++ through developing embedded systems, focusing on low-level programming and hardware interfacing. Applied C in various projects like a robotic car, automatic pet feeder, and handheld video game device to optimize system performance, manage memory, and implement real-time operations.

skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Designed a website to display family recipes using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS, showcasing skills in front-end web development.

skills.title: Python/Modeling
skills.description: Applied Python to solve labs and simple problems during college coursework, developing strong fundamentals in coding. Built a backend using Python with Flask and DynamoDB, enhancing web development skills and backend design. Currently utilizing PyTorch, Beautiful Soup, and pandas to construct a convolutional neural network (CNN), demonstrating proficiency in machine learning and data processing.
